    VTDLP

    Next generation of Digital Library access platform.

    VTDLP is a cloud-native, digital libraries solution supporting preservation and access while taking advantage of the efficiencies of Amazon Web Services. It is a collection of CloudFormation templates, code implementing microservices to support digital library functions, and web applications providing user access.
